content:
# I have successfully extracted 10 copper plates from the copper furnace, and my inventory now contains:
# - 12 wood
# - 3 copper plates
# - 14 copper cables
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# Now, I need to craft the electronic circuits. Each electronic circuit requires:
# - 3 copper cables
# - 1 iron plate

# Since I have 14 copper cables, I can craft up to 4 electronic circuits (which requires 12 cables). 
# However, I need to ensure I have enough iron plates for this as well.

# I currently have 10 iron plates in my inventory (from previous smelting), so I can craft 4 electronic circuits without any issues.

# Let's proceed to craft the electronic circuits.
for _ in range(4):  # Crafting 4 electronic circuits
    craft_item(Prototype.ElectronicCircuit)

# After crafting, I will check the inventory again to see the updated counts.
print(f"Inventory after crafting electronic circuits: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Final check of the inventory after crafting electronic circuits

# At this point, I will have the necessary components to craft an Assembling Machine, which requires:
# - 9 iron plates
# - 5 iron gear wheels
# - 3 electronic circuits

# Let's check if I have enough resources to craft the Assembling Machine. 
# If I do, I will proceed to craft it.
